name: NINearbyObject
desc: Location information for a peer device in an interaction session.

items.name: var discoveryToken: NIDiscoveryToken
items.desc: A unique identifier for a peer device in the session.

items.name: var distance: Float?
items.desc: The distance from the user's device to the peer device in meters.

items.name: var direction: simd_float3?
items.desc: A vector that points from the user's device in the direction of the peer device.

items.name: enum NINearbyObject.RemovalReason
items.desc: The reason a session removed a nearby object.
